title: FS- 75 card lot of raw vg t206's
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: FS- 75 card lot of raw vg t206's
posts.post_content: These 75 cards are mostly vg with a few vg-ex and maybe 2 or 3 good.  Backs are 95% clean with the others having soiling and small paper loss.  Very nice lot for set building.  I will take offers until about 3pm est on Monday or until I get a decent offer.  I will want payment by mo or paypal money owed.  I can also answer ?'s about individual cards if you need.  Please send you offer to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]    SOLD

Offers have been crazy low on this lot.  These cards are psa 3 condition.  Average 3's go between 30 and 40.  I'm going to just ask $25 a card =$1875.  First e-mail to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url] gets them.
